topaz Module¶

exception wepppy.topaz.topaz.DednmCrashedException¶

Bases: Exception

dednm crashed for an unknown reason, try again

exception wepppy.topaz.topaz.MinimumChannelLengthTooShortError¶

Bases: Exception

THE VALUE FOR THE MINIMUM CHANNEL LENGTH FOR A CHANNEL TO BE CLASSIFIED AS A CHANNEL IS TOO SHORT.

IT MUST BE LONGER THAN 1.0 METER AND LONGER THAN A CELL SIDE

class wepppy.topaz.topaz.TopazRunner(topaz_wd, dem, csa=4, mcl=60)¶

Bases: object

Object oriented abstraction for running USDA ARS Topagraphic Parameterization (topaz).

For more infomation on topaz see the manual available here:
https://www.ars.usda.gov/ARSUserFiles/30700510/TOPAZ_User-Manual2.pdf
build_channels(create_channels=True)¶

run topaz to build the channels

build_subcatchments(outlet_px, polygonize_subwta=True)¶

run topaz to build the channels and subcatchments

create_channels_png()¶
create_prj(fname)¶

Create a PRJ for a topaz resource based on dem’s projection

create_prjs()¶

Create prjs for all the .ARC files in the working directory

find_closest_channel(long, lat, pixelcoords=False)¶

find the closest channel give a long and lat or pixel coords (pixelcoords=True)

returns (x, y), distance
where (x, y) are pixel coords and distance is the distance from the specified long, lat and distance is the distance from long, lat in pixels
longlat_to_pixel(long, lat)¶

return the x,y pixel coords of long, lat

pixel_to_longlat(x, y)¶

return the long/lat (WGS84) coords from pixel coords

pixel_to_utm(x, y)¶

return the utm coords from pixel coords

exception wepppy.topaz.topaz.WatershedBoundaryTouchesEdgeError¶

Bases: Exception

THE WATERSHED BOUNDARY TOUCHES THE EDGE OF THE DEM. IT IS POSSIBLE THAT THE ACTUAL WATERSHED EXTENDS BEYOND THE EDGE OF THE DEM.

THE WATERSHED MUST BE FULLY DEFINED WITHIN THE DEM AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT TOUCH THE EDGE OF THE DEM OR AN AREA OF INDETERMINATE ELEVATION.
